posts.post_content: Two posts in one. I have a Vic Willis bat with an AB no frame I'm willing to sell/trade and I'm also looking to buy (or use the Willis as a partial trade for) a Bridwell w/cap, lower grade fine, higher grade too if it's part of the trade. Front just has to be presentable, graded or ungraded. Let me know what you got!

No one has a Bridwell w/cap?

   I'd do this card for a Bridwell w/cap in presentable condition(front needs to be, back damage is fine if it isn't totally destroyed) and $100(or less if the Bridwell is nicer)

  Or I'd just buy the Bridwell

got one for you.  will PM & email.

Cliff
